# Fold-change plot by subtype
```{r fig.width = 10, fig.height = 5}
for (i in unique(data_DH$subtype)){
  n = 30
  if(length(which(data_DH$subtype == i)) < n ) {
    n = length(which(data_DH$subtype == i))
  }
  L2FC_barplot(data_DH, max_metabolites = n, msubtype = i)
}
```
